dublin_core.dcvalue: The dramatic increase in broadband connectivity is opening up the possibility for using telehealth connected teams in an improved system for charity care The Virtual Dental Home demonstration taking place in California provides a model for the development and deployment of such teams Teams using telehealth connections to provide oral health care can transform episodic or one time visits into an ongoing system of care with a much greater emphasis on prevention and early intervention techniques and a greater likelihood of improved oral health for the population
The Journal of the American College of Dentists
The potential for telehealth technologies to facilitate charity care. Creating virtual dental homes.
